article_title: Rep. Grayson Victim of Alexander Capital Markets' Ponzi Scheme
article_text:

A Maine high school is demanding Gov. Paul LePage apologize for fabricating a story about a drug-addicted student overdo . . .

Bill Cosby was ordered Tuesday to stand trial on sexual assault charges after a hearing that hinged on a decade-old poli . . .

We must not believe that ours is a country of the past as some would suggest, the same some who would weaken us by offer . . .

og.description:
Federal court records show Florida Democratic Rep. Alan Grayson was among the more than 100 investors bilked out of millions of dollars by convicted schemer William Dean Chapman, according to a story on Politico.
 
 I can confirm that it's Rep. Grayson,  said an anonymous...
